Text: most grateful for all your uploads esp NFL Games. I decided to retire here in the Philippines & with no TV stations broadcasting the games, I am in the pits. Thanks 4 bringing me out of the hole...he3

btw, luv ur nfl teams mascot. hope it's ok to have it printed on the back of our shirts with TPB logo on the front pocket. This will serve as our fellowship shirt with fellow US retirees-vets & civilians-when we meet every Wed/Fri at Red Lion Restaurant, Baguio City. If ever u r in the area, drop by. the drinks r on us...cheers
